Variable.Name: IN
Variable.Comment: if Rising edge, starts increasing internal timer. If Falling Edge, stops and resets internal timer

Variable.Name: Q
Variable.Comment: if TRUE, programmed time is elapsed

Variable.Name: En_PID_Troom
Variable.Comment: Разрешение на работу ПИД-регулятора Troom (каскадный мастер)

Variable.Name: En_PID_Tsu
Variable.Comment: Разрешение на работу ПИД-регулятора Tsu (каскадный мастер)

Variable.Name: DiffLeft
Variable.Comment: Differential to the left of the setpoint (extreme included)

Variable.Name: DiffRight
Variable.Comment: Differential to the right of the setpoint (extreme included)

Variable.Name: Reverse
Variable.Comment: If true, the function is reverted

Variable.Name: CurrSEQ
Variable.Comment: Текущая посл-сть. Исп. для опред. факта и направления перекл.

Variable.Name: Out
Variable.Comment: Текущая уставка. Должна исп. ПИД Tsu

Variable.Name: IN
Variable.Comment: if Rising edge, starts increasing internal timer. If Falling Edge, stops and resets internal timer

Variable.Name: Q
Variable.Comment: if TRUE, programmed time is elapsed

Variable.Name: CurrSEQ
Variable.Comment: Текущая посл-сть. Исп. для опред. факта и направления перекл.

Variable.Name: Out
Variable.Comment: Текущая уставка. Должна исп. ПИД Tsu

Variable.Name: IN
Variable.Comment: if Rising edge, starts increasing internal timer. If Falling Edge, stops and resets internal timer

Variable.Name: Q
Variable.Comment: if TRUE, programmed time is elapsed

Variable.Name: DeadBand
Variable.Comment: Dead band in which the output is kept unchanged

Variable.Name: Cycle
Variable.Comment: Period of time (ms) that elapses between two updates of Out

Variable.Name: LowLim
Variable.Comment: Low limit. It is only a limitation of the output, but it doesen't affect the calculationof the output

Variable.Name: HighLim
Variable.Comment: High limit. It is only a limitation of the output, but it doesen't affect the calculationof the output

Variable.Name: ManOut
Variable.Comment: Value of output when ManMode is true.

Variable.Name: En_PID
Variable.Comment: Enables the regulation (if false, output is 0)

Variable.Name: Deriv
Variable.Comment: Derivative term, for internal use. See DerivativeTerm

Variable.Name: Integr
Variable.Comment: Integral term, for internal use. See IntegralTerm

Variable.Name: AntiBump
Variable.Comment: If true, anti bump must be applied (internal use)

Variable.Comment: Dead band in which the output is kept unchanged

Variable.Name: Cycle
Variable.Comment: Period of time (ms) that elapses between two updates of Out

Variable.Comment: Low limit. It is only a limitation of the output, but it doesen't affect the calculationof the output

Variable.Name: HighLim

Variable.Comment: Value of output when ManMode is true.

Variable.Name: HighLim

Variable.Name: ManOut

Variable.Name: En_PID
Variable.Comment: Enables the regulation (if false, output is 0)

Variable.Comment: Derivative term, for internal use. See DerivativeTerm

Variable.Name: Integr

Variable.Name: AntiBump

Variable.Name: Q
Variable.Comment: TRUE when CLK rises from FALSE to TRUE. False in other cases

Variable.Name: Q
Variable.Comment: TRUE when CLK rises from FALSE to TRUE. False in other cases

Variable.Name: IN
Variable.Comment: if Rising edge, starts increasing internal timer. If Falling Edge, stops and resets internal timer

Variable.Name: Q
Variable.Comment: if TRUE, programmed time is elapsed

Variable.Name: MaxCurrSeq
Variable.Comment: Maximum number of sequences in direction

Variable.Name: IN
Variable.Comment: If Rising edge, starts increasing internal timer (if not already increasing). If FALSE and only if timer is elapsed, resets the internal timer. Any change on IN during counting has no effect.

Variable.Name: Q
Variable.Comment: TRUE when CLK changes from TRUE to FALSE. FALSE if all other cases

Variable.Comment: if TRUE, programmed time is elapsed
